snippet: During the past nine months, the United States players have navigated a coaching change, a failed lawsuit over the use of artificial turf at the World Cup, and troublesome injuries to key players.
abstract: United States women's goalkeeper Hope Solo is serving 30-day suspension from team, and will miss exhibition game against France; teammates are worried they will have to play in World Cup without her; Solo has not missed even a minute of team's World Cup or Olympic games since 2008.
lead_paragraph: During the past nine months, the United States players have navigated a coaching change, a failed lawsuit over the use of artificial turf at the World Cup, and troublesome injuries to key players.

headline.main: Trouble, on Field and Off, for Mighty U.S. Before Women’s World Cup
headline.print_headline: Trouble, on Field and Off, for Mighty U.S. Before Women’s World Cup

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United States Women's National Soccer Team
